00034 // Underlying CCelFileData class expects backslashes rather than forward slashes on Windows hmmmm
00035 const string testFiles[] = 
00036 {
00037         "doesnt_exist.CHP",                                                                                                             // file does not exist - for testing when a file does not exist
00038 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/GCOS104-U133a.CHP",
00039 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/pcwrs041a_pd01.CHP",
00040 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/NA02705_00243_01_3001197.CHP",
00041         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/10k_1-calvin.CHP",
00042 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/T1_r1_stat.CHP",
00043 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/T1_r1_v_T2_r1_stat.CHP",
00044         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/DCN_01_xda-calvin.CHP",
00045 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/GCOS104-U133a-test_rel.CHP",
00046 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/StatData_baseline.CHP",
00047         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/StatData-calvin.CHP",
00048         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/PLIERdata1-calvin.CHP"
00049 };
00050 const int FILE_NAME_LIST_COUNT = 5; // does not count the does not exist file case because we do not explicitly test it
00051 
00052 const int DOES_NOT_EXIST = 0;   // index into the file name array above of the file does not exist name
00053 
00054 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION(FusionCHPDataCalvinTest);

00056 // has to be called before each test
00057 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::setUp()
00058 {
00059 }
00060 
00061 // has to be called after each test
00062 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::tearDown()
00063 {
00064 }
00065 
00066 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::TestFileId()
00067 {
00068         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(testFiles[3]);
00069         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->FileId() == "0000065535-1131145034-0000006334-0000018467-0000000041");
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->GetGenericData()->FileIdentifier() == "0000065535-1131145034-0000006334-0000018467-0000000041");
00072 }

00082 // main test entry method, calls the rest.
00083 // had to do it this way, because CPPUINT will not accept test method parameters
00084 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::TestAll()
00085 {
00086         // loop over each chp file to test
00087         for(int i = 1; i < FILE_NAME_LIST_COUNT; ++i)
00088         {
00089                 string fileName = testFiles[i];
00090 
00091                 CreationTest(fileName);
00092                 tearDown();
00093                 setUp();
00094                 ReadHeaderTest(fileName);
00095                 tearDown();
00096                 setUp();
00097                 RowsColsTest(fileName);
00098                 tearDown();
00099                 setUp();
00100                 VersionTest(fileName);
00101                 tearDown();
00102                 setUp();
00103                 AlgorithmNameAndVersionTest(fileName);
00104                 tearDown();
00105                 setUp();
00106                 ChipTypeTest(fileName);
00107                 tearDown();
00108                 setUp();
00109                 ParentCelFileName(fileName);
00110                 tearDown();
00111                 setUp();
00112                 ProgIDTest(fileName);
00113                 tearDown();
00114                 setUp();
00115                 AlgParamsTest(fileName);
00116                 tearDown();
00117                 setUp();
00118                 SummaryParamsTest(fileName);
00119                 tearDown();
00120                 setUp();
00121                 NumberOfSetsTest(fileName);
00122                 tearDown();
00123                 setUp();
00124                 ReadHeaderAndVerifyAlgParamsTest(fileName);
00125                 tearDown();
00126                 setUp();
00127                 ReadHeaderAndVerifySummaryParamsTest(fileName);
00128                 tearDown();
00129                 setUp();
00130                 ReadTest(fileName);
00131                 tearDown();
00132                 setUp();
00133                 CallMethodsWhenObjectIsNotReadyTest(fileName);
00134                 tearDown();
00135                 setUp();
00136                 DataCompareTest(fileName);
00137                 tearDown();
00138                 setUp();
00139                 BackgroundDataTest(fileName);
00140         }
00141 }

00143 // test that we can read the chp header information
00144 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::ReadHeaderTest(string fileName)
00145 {
00146         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00147         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00149 
00150         CHPData calvinChp;
00151         CHPFileReader reader;
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00153         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00154 
00155         delete fusionChp;
00156 }

00158 // test the rows and colums
00159 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::RowsColsTest(string fileName)
00160 {
00161         CHPData calvinChp;
00162         CHPFileReader reader;
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00165 
00166         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00167         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00168         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00169 
00170         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - # rows!",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetRows() == calvinChp.GetRows());
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - # cols!",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetCols() == calvinChp.GetCols());
00172         delete fusionChp;
00173 }

00239 // test the prog id
00240 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::ProgIDTest(string fileName)
00241 {
00242         CHPData calvinChp;
00243         CHPFileReader reader;
00244         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00245         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00246 
00247         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00248         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00249         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00250 
00251         std::wstring progid;
00252         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00253         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: ProgID not found in calvin file", calvinChp.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(CHP_PROGID, paramType));
00254         progid = paramType.GetValueText();
00255         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - ProgID!", fusionChp->GetHeader().GetProgID() == progid);
00256         delete fusionChp;
00257 }
00258 
00259 // test the algorithm params
00260 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::AlgParamsTest(string fileName)
00261 {
00262         CHPData calvinChp;
00263         CHPFileReader reader;
00264         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00265         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00266 
00267         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00268         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00269         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00270 
00271   FusionTagValuePairTypeList algParamsFusion;
00272   fusionChp->GetHeader().AlgorithmParameters(algParamsFusion);
00273   FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator beginFusion = algParamsFusion.begin();
00274   FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator endFusion = algParamsFusion.end();
00275 
00276         const ParameterNameValueTypeVector& algParamsCalvin = calvinChp.GetAlgParams();
00277         ParameterNameValueTypeVector::const_iterator beginCalvin = algParamsCalvin.begin(), endCalvin = algParamsCalvin.end();
00278 
00279         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(algParamsFusion.size() == algParamsCalvin.size());
00280 
00281         typedef map<wstring,wstring,less<wstring> > theFusionMap;
00282         theFusionMap map;
00283 
00284         // need the map to have an easy lookup for the key to see if the fusion has the key
00285         for (; beginFusion != endFusion; beginFusion++)
00286         {
00287                 map.insert(theFusionMap::value_type(beginFusion->Tag,beginFusion->Value));
00288         }
00289 
00290         theFusionMap::const_iterator findIt;
00291         for(; beginCalvin != endCalvin; beginCalvin++)
00292         {
00293                 // test single alg value call
00294                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare Algorithm Parameter!", fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgorithmParameter(beginCalvin->GetName().c_str()) == beginCalvin->ToString());
00295 
00296                 // test to see if the keys and values are the same between what was retrieved from fusion get algorithm params and
00297                 // with what was retrieved by the Calvin api
00298                 findIt = map.find(beginCalvin->GetName());
00299                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Faile: Algorithm parameter not found in Fusion list", findIt != map.end());
00300                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Faile: Algorithm parameter not found in Fusion list", findIt->second == beginCalvin->ToString());
00301         }
00302         delete fusionChp;
00303 }
00304 
00305 // tests the summary params
00306 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::SummaryParamsTest(string fileName)
00307 {
00308         CHPData calvinChp;
00309         CHPFileReader reader;
00310         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00311         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00312 
00313         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00314         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00315         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00316 
00317   FusionTagValuePairTypeList sumParamsFusion;
00318   fusionChp->GetHeader().SummaryParameters(sumParamsFusion);
00319   FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator beginFusion = sumParamsFusion.begin();
00320   FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator endFusion = sumParamsFusion.end();
00321 
00322         const ParameterNameValueTypeVector& sumParamsCalvin = calvinChp.GetChipSums();
00323         ParameterNameValueTypeVector::const_iterator beginCalvin = sumParamsCalvin.begin(), endCalvin = sumParamsCalvin.end();
00324 
00325         typedef map<wstring,wstring,less<wstring> > theFusionMap;
00326         theFusionMap map;
00327 
00328         // need the map to have an easy lookup for the key to see if the fusion has the key
00329         for (; beginFusion != endFusion; beginFusion++)
00330         {
00331                 map.insert(theFusionMap::value_type(beginFusion->Tag,beginFusion->Value));
00332         }
00333 
00334         theFusionMap::const_iterator findIt;
00335         for(; beginCalvin != endCalvin; beginCalvin++)
00336         {
00337                 // test single alg value call
00338                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare Summary Parameter!", fusionChp->GetHeader().GetSummaryParameter(beginCalvin->GetName().c_str()) == beginCalvin->ToString());
00339 
00340                 // test to see if the keys and values are the same between what was retrieved from fusion get algorithm params and
00341                 // with what was retrieved by the calvin api
00342                 findIt = map.find(beginCalvin->GetName());
00343                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Faile: Algorithm parameter not found in Fusion list", findIt != map.end());
00344                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Faile: Algorithm parameter not found in Fusion list", findIt->second == beginCalvin->ToString());
00345         }
00346         delete fusionChp;
00347 }

00366 // tests the algorithm parameters
00367 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::ReadHeaderAndVerifyAlgParamsTest(string fileName)
00368 {
00369         // read the header with the fusion api
00370         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00371         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00372         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00373 
00374         // read the header with the calvin api
00375         CHPData calvinChp;
00376         CHPFileReader reader;
00377         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00378         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00379 
00380         // get the calvin list
00381         ParameterNameValueTypeVector listCalvin = calvinChp.GetAlgParams();
00382         FusionTagValuePairTypeList listFusion;
00383         // get the fusion list
00384         fusionChp->GetHeader().AlgorithmParameters(listFusion);
00385 
00386         // test that the number of parameters are the same between a pure calvin file sdk call and the fusdion api call
00387         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg param count",listFusion.size() == listCalvin.size());
00388 
00389         // this section will test that the parameters read by both the pure calvin api and the fusion are the same
00390         // first we get the interators for the loop
00391         FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator beginFusion = listFusion.begin();
00392         FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator endFusion = listFusion.end();
00393         ParameterNameValueTypeVector::iterator beginCalvin = listCalvin.begin();
00394         ParameterNameValueTypeVector::iterator endCalvin = listCalvin.end();
00395 
00396         // loop over every parameter in the fusion parameter list and use it to get the value thru the getalgorithmparameter call
00397         // we could of used the value property of the of the iterator that is from the fusion algorithm list retrieved
00398         // early, but this is to exerise the get individual alg params api for both.
00399         // However, I will test the interator Value property from the fusion list and compare it to the other values returned from the
00400         // the get alg parameter calls
00401         for (; beginFusion != endFusion && beginCalvin != endCalvin ; beginFusion++, beginCalvin++)
00402         {
00403                 // get the fusion value for the parameter name
00404                 wstring tempFusion = fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgorithmParameter(beginFusion->Tag.c_str());
00405                 // get the calvin value for the parameter name
00406                 // have to convert the string to wstring first though
00407                 ParameterNameValueType tempCalvin = calvinChp.GetAlgParam(beginFusion->Tag);
00408 
00409                 // double check that the value from the fusion list is the same as the other values retieved from the get alg params calls
00410                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", tempFusion == tempCalvin.ToString() && beginFusion->Value == tempCalvin.ToString());
00411 
00412                 // check the Detail information
00413                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", beginFusion->DetailedType().GetName() == beginCalvin->GetName());
00414                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", beginFusion->DetailedType().GetParameterType() == beginCalvin->GetParameterType());
00415                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", beginFusion->DetailedType().ToString() == beginCalvin->ToString());
00416         }
00417         delete fusionChp;
00418 }
00419 
00420 // tests the summary parameters
00421 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::ReadHeaderAndVerifySummaryParamsTest(string fileName)
00422 {
00423         // read the header with the fusion api
00424         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00425         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00426         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00427 
00428         // read the header with the calvin api
00429         CHPData calvinChp;
00430         CHPFileReader reader;
00431         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00432         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00433 
00434         // get the calvin list
00435         ParameterNameValueTypeVector listCalvin = calvinChp.GetChipSums();
00436         FusionTagValuePairTypeList listFusion;
00437         // get the fusion list
00438         fusionChp->GetHeader().SummaryParameters(listFusion);
00439 
00440         // test that the number of parameters are the same between a pure calvin file sdk call and the fusdion api call
00441         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - param list count",listFusion.size() == listCalvin.size());
00442 
00443         // this section will test that the parameters read by both the pure calvin api and the fusion are the same
00444         // first we get the interators for the loop
00445         FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator beginFusion = listFusion.begin();
00446         FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator endFusion = listFusion.end();
00447         ParameterNameValueTypeVector::iterator beginCalvin = listCalvin.begin();
00448         ParameterNameValueTypeVector::iterator endCalvin = listCalvin.end();
00449 
00450         // loop over every parameter in the fusion parameter list and use it to get the value thru the getsummaryparameter call
00451         // we could of used the value property of the of the iterator that is from the fusion summary list retrieved
00452         // early, but this is to exerise the get individual summary params api for both.
00453         // However, I will test the interator Value property from the fusion list and compare it to the other values returned from the
00454         // the get summary parameter calls
00455         for (; beginFusion != endFusion && beginCalvin != endCalvin ; beginFusion++, beginCalvin++)
00456         {
00457                 // get the fusion value for the parameter name
00458                 wstring tempFusion = fusionChp->GetHeader().GetSummaryParameter(beginFusion->Tag.c_str());
00459                 // get the calvin value for the parameter name
00460                 // have to convert the string to wstring first though
00461                 ParameterNameValueType tempCalvin = calvinChp.GetChipSum(beginFusion->Tag);
00462 
00463                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", tempFusion == tempCalvin.ToString() && beginFusion->Value == tempCalvin.ToString());
00464 
00465                 // check the Detail information
00466                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", beginFusion->DetailedType().GetName() == beginCalvin->GetName());
00467                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", beginFusion->DetailedType().GetParameterType() == beginCalvin->GetParameterType());
00468                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", beginFusion->DetailedType().ToString() == beginCalvin->ToString());
00469         }
00470         delete fusionChp;
00471 }
00472 
00473 // test the read method of fusion. This differs only from previous readheader tests in that instead of readheader being called
00474 // read is called.
00475 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::ReadTest(string fileName)
00476 {
00477         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read(fileName);
00478         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00479         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00480 
00481         CHPData calvinChp;
00482         CHPFileReader reader;
00483         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00484         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00485 
00486         // Check some header values
00487         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - version",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetVersion() == calvinChp.GetVersion());
00488         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - cols",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetCols() == calvinChp.GetCols());
00489         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - rows",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetRows() == calvinChp.GetRows());
00490         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - # probesets",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets() == calvinChp.GetEntryCount());
00491         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg name",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgName() == calvinChp.GetAlgName());
00492   CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg version",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgVersion() == calvinChp.GetAlgVersion());
00493         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - chip type",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetChipType() == calvinChp.GetArrayType());
00494         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - parent cell name",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetParentCellFile() == calvinChp.GetParentCell());
00495         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg count",fusionChp->GetHeader().AlgorithmParameterCount() == calvinChp.GetAlgParams().size());
00496         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - sum count",fusionChp->GetHeader().SummaryParameterCount() == calvinChp.GetChipSums().size());
00497         //CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - prog id",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetProgID() == StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(calvinChp.GetHeader().GetProgID()));
00498         delete fusionChp;
00499 }

00514 // tests the main data of the chp file
00515 // currently supports expression, genotyping, universal, and soon resequencing
00516 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::DataCompareTest(string fileName)
00517 {
00518         // here we compare the data contents with both the calvin reader and the fusion reader and they better be the same
00519         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read(fileName);
00520         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00521         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00522 
00523         CHPData calvinChp;
00524         CHPFileReader reader;
00525         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00526         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00527 
00528         CHPExpressionEntry resultsCalvinExpression;
00529         FusionExpressionProbeSetResults resultsFusionExpression;
00530 
00531         CHPGenotypeEntry resultsCalvinGeno;
00532         FusionGenotypeProbeSetResults resultsFusionGeno;
00533 
00534         CHPUniversalEntry resultsCalvinUni;
00535         FusionUniversalProbeSetResults resultsFusionUni;
00536 
00537         u_int32_t count = fusionChp->GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets(); 
00538         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - # probesets",count == calvinChp.GetEntryCount());
00539 
00540 
00541         if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAssayType() == FusionExpression)
00542         {
00543                 // for each type supported, get the probeset results
00544                 // loop over the number of probesets
00545                 for(u_int32_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00546                 {
00547                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->GetExpressionResults(i, resultsFusionExpression));
00548                         calvinChp.GetEntry(i, resultsCalvinExpression);
00549                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - DetectionPValue",resultsFusionExpression.GetDetectionPValue() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetDetectionPValue());
00550                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Signal",resultsFusionExpression.GetSignal() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetSignal());
00551                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Signal",resultsFusionExpression.GetNumPairs() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetNumPairs());
00552                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - NumPairs",resultsFusionExpression.GetNumUsedPairs() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetNumPairsUsed());
00553                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Detection",resultsFusionExpression.GetDetection() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetDetection());
00554                         bool b1 = resultsFusionExpression.HasCompResults();
00555                         bool b2 = resultsCalvinExpression.GetHasComparisonData();
00556                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - m_HasCompResults",resultsFusionExpression.HasCompResults() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetHasComparisonData());
00557                         if (resultsFusionExpression.HasCompResults())
00558                         {
00559                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - ChangePValue",resultsFusionExpression.GetChangePValue() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetChangePValue());
00560                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - SignalLogRatio",resultsFusionExpression.GetSignalLogRatio() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetSigLogRatio());
00561                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - SignalLogRatioLow",resultsFusionExpression.GetSignalLogRatioLow() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetSigLogRatioLo());
00562                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - SignalLogRatioHigh",resultsFusionExpression.GetSignalLogRatioHigh() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetSigLogRatioHi());
00563                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - NumCommonPairs",resultsFusionExpression.GetNumCommonPairs() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetCommonPairs());
00564                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Change",resultsFusionExpression.GetChange() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetChange());
00565         //                      CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - GetDetectionString",resultsFusionExpression.GetDetectionString() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetDetectionString());
00566         //                      CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - GetChangeString",resultsFusionExpression.GetChangeString() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetChangeString());
00567                         }
00568                 }
00569         }
00570         else if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAssayType() == FusionGenotyping)
00571         {
00572                 // for genotyping, we have a special case
00573                 // for 10k we only check curtain parameters are checked and in 100K other are checked.
00574                 // because we are not guaranteed to have properly initialized data from the files, we 
00575                 // have to make checks against the algorithm names.
00576                 // there are currently two.
00577                 // if there are any algs added in the future, we will need to update this else if to include it.
00578                 bool bWholeGenenome = false, bDynamicModel = false;
00579 
00580                 if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgName() == L"WholeGenome")
00581                 {
00582                         bWholeGenenome = true;
00583                 }
00584                 else if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgName() == L"DynamicModel")
00585                 {
00586                         bDynamicModel = true;
00587                 }
00588 
00589                 // for each type supported, get the probeset results
00590                 // loop over the number of probesets
00591                 for(u_int32_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00592                 {
00593                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->GetGenotypingResults(i, resultsFusionGeno));
00594                         calvinChp.GetEntry(i, resultsCalvinGeno);
00595                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - AlleleCall",resultsFusionGeno.GetAlleleCall() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetCall());
00596                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Confidence",resultsFusionGeno.GetConfidence() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetConfidence());
00597         //              CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - AlleleCallString",resultsFusionGeno.GetAlleleCallString() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetAlleleCallString());
00598 
00599                         if(bWholeGenenome)
00600                         {
00601                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - RAS1",resultsFusionGeno.GetRAS1() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetRAS1());
00602                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - RAS2",resultsFusionGeno.GetRAS2() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetRAS2());
00603                         }
00604                         else if(bDynamicModel)
00605                         {
00606                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - pvalue_AA",resultsFusionGeno.GetPValueAA() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetAACall());
00607                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - pvalue_AB",resultsFusionGeno.GetPValueAB() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetABCall());
00608                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - pvalue_BB",resultsFusionGeno.GetPValueBB() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetBBCall());
00609                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - pvalue_NoCall",resultsFusionGeno.GetPValueNoCall() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetNoCall());
00610                         }
00611                 }
00612         }
00613         else if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAssayType() == FusionUniversal)
00614         {
00615                 // for each type supported, get the probeset results
00616                 // loop over the number of probesets
00617                 for(u_int32_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00618                 {
00619                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->GetUniversalResults(i, resultsFusionUni));
00620                         calvinChp.GetEntry(i, resultsCalvinUni);
00621                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Background",resultsFusionUni.GetBackground() == resultsCalvinUni.GetBackground());
00622                 }
00623         }
00624         else if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAssayType() == FusionResequencing)
00625         {
00626                 FusionResequencingResults fusionResults;
00627                 fusionChp->GetReseqResults(fusionResults);
00628 
00629                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetCalledBasesSize() == calvinChp.GetEntryCount());
00630                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetForceCallsSize() == calvinChp.GetForceCnt());
00631                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetOrigCallsSize() == calvinChp.GetOrigCnt());
00632 
00633                 const Int8Vector &fusionCalls = fusionResults.GetCalledBases();
00634                 const FloatVector &fusionScores = fusionResults.GetScores();
00635 
00636                 int sz = fusionResults.GetCalledBasesSize();
00637                 for (int i=0; i<sz; i++)
00638                 {
00639                         CHPReseqEntry calvinResult;
00640                         calvinChp.GetEntry(i, calvinResult);
00641                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetCalledBase(i) == calvinResult.call);
00642                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetScore(i) == calvinResult.score);
00643                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionCalls[i] == calvinResult.call);
00644                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionScores[i] == calvinResult.score);
00645                 }
00646 
00647                 FusionForceCallType fusionForce;
00648                 const FusionForceCallVector& fusionForces = fusionResults.GetForceCalls();
00649 
00650                 sz = fusionResults.GetForceCallsSize();
00651                 for (int i=0; i<sz; i++)
00652                 {
00653                         fusionForce = fusionResults.GetForceCall(i);
00654 
00655                         CHPReseqForceCall calvinForce;
00656                         calvinChp.GetForceCall(i, calvinForce);
00657 
00658                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForce.GetPosition() == calvinForce.position);
00659                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForce.GetCall() == calvinForce.call);
00660                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForce.GetReason() == calvinForce.reason);
00661 
00662                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForces[i].GetPosition() == calvinForce.position);
00663                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForces[i].GetCall() == calvinForce.call);
00664                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForces[i].GetReason() == calvinForce.reason);
00665                 }
00666 
00667                 FusionBaseCallType fusionOrig;
00668                 const FusionBaseCallVector& fusionOrigs = fusionResults.GetOrigCalls();
00669 
00670                 sz = fusionResults.GetOrigCallsSize();
00671                 for (int i=0; i<sz; i++)
00672                 {
00673                         fusionOrig = fusionResults.GetOrigCall(i);
00674 
00675                         CHPReseqOrigCall calvinOrig;
00676                         calvinChp.GetOrigCall(i, calvinOrig);
00677 
00678                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionOrig.GetPosition() == calvinOrig.position);
00679                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionOrig.GetCall() == calvinOrig.call);
00680 
00681                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionOrigs[i].GetPosition() == calvinOrig.position);
00682                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionOrigs[i].GetCall() == calvinOrig.call);
00683                 }
00684         }
00685         delete fusionChp;
00686 }
00687 
00688 // tests the background data for the chp file. This tests the backgroundzones, backgroundinfo and backgroundtype for each zone
00689 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::BackgroundDataTest(string fileName)
00690 {
00691         CPPUNIT_ADDITIONALMESSAGE_H
00692         // here we compare the background data contents with both the calvin reader and the fusion reader and they better be the same
00693         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00694         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00695         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00696 
00697         CHPData calvinChp;
00698         CHPFileReader reader;
00699         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00700         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00701 
00702         BackgroundZoneInfo zoneInfoFusion;
00703         fusionChp->GetHeader().GetBackgroundZoneInfo(zoneInfoFusion);
00704 
00705         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - number_zones",zoneInfoFusion.number_zones == calvinChp.GetBackgroundZoneCnt());
00706 //      CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - smooth_factor",zoneInfoFusion.smooth_factor == zoneInfocalvin.smooth_factor);
00707         BackgroundZoneTypeList zonesFusion = zoneInfoFusion.zones;
00708 
00709 //      CHPBackgroundZoneVector calvinZones;
00710 //      calvinChp.GetBackgroundZones(0, ?, calvinZones);
00711 
00712         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - GetChangeString",zonesFusion.size() == calvinChp.GetBackgroundZoneCnt());
00713 
00714         BackgroundZoneTypeList::iterator beginFusion = zonesFusion.begin(), endFusion = zonesFusion.end();
00715 
00716         for(int32_t izone = 0; beginFusion != endFusion && izone < calvinChp.GetBackgroundZoneCnt(); beginFusion++, izone++)
00717         {
00718                 CHPBackgroundZone calvinZone;
00719                 calvinChp.GetBackgroundZone(izone, calvinZone);
00720                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - centerx",beginFusion->centerx == calvinZone.GetCenterX());
00721                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - centery",beginFusion->centery == calvinZone.GetCenterY());
00722                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - background",beginFusion->background == calvinZone.GetBackground());
00723         }
00724         delete fusionChp;
00725 }
